creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
I don't reproduce issue using JMeter 3.1. I get immediately a popup saying "Error loading file - could not open file"
Can you test with a 3.1 ?

If issue persists, please provide jmeter.log file ,a screenshot of the error and all steps that led to this bug.
Thanks

Closing as no feedback and cannot reproduce with given information.
Feel free to reopen with more details.
